basicInfo.notes: Launched 2005 by Automattic (Matt Mullenweg). The official hosted WordPress platform by the creators of WordPress. Powers 160M+ websites. Part of Automattic ecosystem with Pressable, WooCommerce, Jetpack, Tumblr. Automated datacenter failover for 100% uptime. Edge caching CDN included. Same company that maintains WordPress.org open source project.

pricing.moneyBackExclusions: 14-day refund policy for annual plans; Domain registration fees non-refundable

serverPerformance.cdnProvider: Automattic CDN (28+ data centers across 6 continents)

pluginRestrictions: Plugin installation requires Business plan or higher

policiesOverages.bandwidthOveragePolicy: No overages. No metering. No surprises. Unrestricted bandwidth on all paid plans.
policiesOverages.hiddenFeesNotes: Free plan available with ads; Personal $4/mo annual; Premium $8/mo; Business $25/mo; Commerce $45/mo; No price increases on same plan; Plugin/theme installation requires Business+ plan; Email hosting not included; Domain privacy free

contentRestrictions.contentNotes: WordPress-only platform; Strict content policies; Free plan shows ads

editorial.knownIssues: Plugin/theme installation locked to Business+ plans ($25+/mo); No email hosting included; Free plan shows WordPress ads; Limited customization on lower tiers; Can't access PHP directly; Mixed Trustpilot reviews (2.0); Pricing perceived as expensive for features
editorial.bestFor: Beginners wanting official WordPress experience; Bloggers and content creators; Users wanting hassle-free managed WordPress; Sites needing 100% uptime guarantee; Automattic ecosystem integration
editorial.avoidIf: Need full WordPress control on budget; Want to install custom plugins cheaply; Need email hosting included; Prefer cPanel access; Budget-conscious and need plugins; Running WooCommerce (Commerce plan expensive)
editorial.competitorComparisonNotes: Official WordPress hosting by Automattic; 160M+ websites; G2 4.4 but Trustpilot 2.0 mixed; 100% uptime with datacenter failover; Edge caching CDN; Same company as Pressable; Competes with Bluehost, SiteGround, Pressable; Plugin access requires expensive Business plan

comparisonData.uniqueSellingPoint: Official WordPress hosting by Automattic with 100% uptime guarantee and edge caching CDN
comparisonData.idealCustomerProfile: Beginner blogger or content creator wanting the official hassle-free WordPress experience with maximum uptime

faqContent.faqIsThisHostGood: WordPress.com is the official WordPress hosting by Automattic with G2 4.4 rating. Powers 160M+ websites with 100% uptime guarantee. Trustpilot 2.0 reflects frustration with pricing tiers.
faqContent.faqWhoOwnsThisHost: WordPress.com is owned by Automattic, founded by Matt Mullenweg (WordPress co-creator). Same company owns Pressable, WooCommerce, Jetpack, and Tumblr.
faqContent.faqHowMuchDoesItCost: Free plan available. Personal $4/mo, Premium $8/mo, Business $25/mo, Commerce $45/mo (annual). Business+ required for plugin installation.
faqContent.faqIsItBeginnerFriendly: Extremely beginner-friendly with the official WordPress experience. Block editor (Gutenberg) makes site building easy. No technical knowledge required.
faqContent.faqDoesItIncludeEmail: No, WordPress.com does not include email hosting. Email forwarding available. Recommends Google Workspace or Titan Mail separately.
faqContent.faqCanIHostWordPress: Yes, this IS official WordPress hosting. Pre-installed and managed. Custom plugins/themes require Business plan ($25/mo) or higher.
faqContent.faqWhatsTheUptime: WordPress.com guarantees 99.999% uptime with automated datacenter failover and multi-region replication.
faqContent.faqCanICancelAnytime: Yes, 14-day refund policy for annual plans. Monthly billing available. Domain registration fees are non-refundable.
